to prostrate oneself in worship (idiom)/(fig.) to worship/to bow down to

agricultural plastic, used largely for creating greenhouses

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.

sentences.english: The perichondrium carries the blood supply to the cartilage.
sentences.chinese: 軟骨膜是向軟骨輸送血液的。

sentences.english: Some evidence is available to aid our understanding of the biogenesis of membrane of microbodies in plants.
sentences.chinese: 有些證據有助於我們瞭解植物微體膜的生物發生。

sentences.english: Drying temperature was one of the most important factors that would affect the properties of edible wheat gluten films.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥溫度是影響谷朊粉可食性膜性能的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: A method for preparing chicken erythrocyte membranes in the form of small vesicles has been described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了一種以囊泡形式製取雞紅細胞膜的方法。

sentences.english: The flexible dolly bar can effectively adjust the film space, and perform the accurate orientation.
sentences.chinese: 靈活的調節杆，能快速有效地調整膜距，正確定位。

sentences.english: Glutaraldehyde can strengthen the conjugation of NCF with protein.
sentences.chinese: 用戊二醛處理硝酸纖維素膜可以增強蛋白吸附。

sentences.english: Bi-pedicle muscular flap were used to reconstruct the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 殘喉創面修復用雙蒂肌軟骨膜瓣重建喉功能。

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相轉換法制備了聚偏氟乙烯不對稱微孔膜。

sentences.english: The design of the film-systems used for bio-fluorescence excitation and barrier filters were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述生物熒光激發濾光片及柵濾光片的膜系設計。

sentences.english: The sheet of membrane was formed from the oxygenation of dry oil.
sentences.chinese: 這層膜是由於乾性油氧化形成的。

sentences.english: Free-radicals mostly destroy membranaceous structures of cell and organelle.

sentences.english: Nafion membranes have been most widely used as a PEM in fuel cells.

sentences.english: Along the length of the filter, the interference film looks like a wedge .
sentences.chinese: 沿薄膜的長度方向看干涉膜似尖劈。

sentences.english: Ooplasm was gradually filled up with yolk granules, and the membrane of the germinal vesicle began to disappear.
